text:
<!channel> Hi Everyone!
Thanks so much for joining our Slack workspace, we’re excited to have you here! We are still working out some of the details for our group, but we’ll have more information for you all soon. In the meantime, if you haven’t filled in the doodle poll yet, it would be great if you could do so now. It only has 3 times, so it should be quick :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://doodle.com/poll/2bcm4yabckdciyrf>

attachments.title: Doodle: Open Science Student Support Group
attachments.text: Doodle is the simplest way to schedule meetings with clients, colleagues, or friends. Find the best time for one-to-ones and team meetings with our user-friendly calendar tool. Get started today!
attachments.fallback: Doodle: Open Science Student Support Group

elements.text:
